entry.title: Replacement Battery For Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus G955
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck Battery
Type: Battery
Price: 17.99

You have a Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus that no longer holds a charge the way it did when it was new?

Your Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus shuts down unexpectedly?

Does your cell phone only work when the battery is plugged in?

Those are common symptoms that a defective battery will have.

It is time to get a new Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus replacement battery.

The old battery in your cell phone can outgrow inside and damage the internals.

The OEM Batteries for Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus are brand-new batteries coming directly from our manufacturer. They are custom-built for customers who demand the same quality as original Samsung batteries. 

  • Zero cycle count
  • Tested under extreme weather
  • No wrapping for a better fit
  • High output current capacity
  • 1 Year Warranty

Compatibility

This battery is only compatible with a Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus.

Warranty

The Replacement Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus Battery comes with a 1-year warranty, as the other Samsung Battery Replacement Parts.

Part Type Samsung Battery
Compatible Model Samsung Galaxy S8 Plus
Battery Type Non-removable Li-Ion 3500 mAh battery
Device Manufacturer Unlockr
Warranty 1 Year Warranty
